paper_title: Multimodal fluorescence microscope with fast adaptive polarimetry

specifications_table.Hardware name: Fast adaptive polarimetry and fluorescence microscope
specifications_table.Subject area: • Material science • Physical chemistry • Colloids, liquid crystals, and complex fluids • Biological materials
specifications_table.Hardware type: • Imaging tools • Measuring physical properties and in-lab sensors • Field measurements and sensors • Mechanical engineering and materials science
specifications_table.Hardware characteristics: • Field of view of 700 μ m, with 10x objectives and the used cameras • Spatial resolution of 1.2 μ m/pixel, with 10x objectives, the used cameras, and no binning • Rate of full polarimetry frame capture of 2.5 Hz
specifications_table.Closest commercial analog: • OpenPolscope. Basic kit to adapt to an existing polarization microscope. Slow performance (several seconds). • Oosight (Hamilton Thorne) and Abrio (Perkin Elmer). More user friendly implementations that assemble into a standard microscope. Costly and slow performance (several seconds). • PolarAIDE (OCTAX). A basic, qualitative implementation. Not for quantitative purposes. • Exicor Microimager (Hinds Instruments). Complete setup based on the OpenPolscope. Good sensitivity but very slow performance (nearly ten seconds). • Birefringent Imaging System (Thorlabs LCC7201B). Standalone setup based on a LC retarder. Also, for improved modularity, Cerna Birefringence Imaging Microscope (Thorlabs). Good sensitivity, but very slow performance (20 s).
specifications_table.Cost of hardware: 8400€ + cost of cameras and software licenses (complete breakdown will be included in the Bill of Materials). Prices up to date in July 2023.

bill_of_materials.Component: Respirator Mask Main mask body to hold the protective screen, exhaust port, and CPAP hose.
Battery Holder Body connected to the bottom of the active gear made to hold the battery.
Battery Cover Cover with a specific pattern for the battery and quick release spring locks.
Belt Support Support for the active gear that allows the usage of a belt.
Gear Body Main body of the active gear were the filter, battery holder, voltage regulator and other components are mounted.
Filter Cover Cover for the A95 filter which helps to hold the part in place and has quick release spring locks.
Voltage Regulator Cover Cover for the voltage regulator to prevent any change or disturbance in the electronic.
Screen Lock Lock for the screen mask which holds in place the protective screen.
Exhaust Port Cover Exhaust port cover which protect the flexible film from any debris.
TPU Gaskets Gaskets for the blower inlet and outlet ports to avoid any droplet getting into the air circuit.
A95 Filter Filter provided by ACAMP and capable of retain COVID-19 particles.
Mask Screen Clear protective screen for the front of the mask respirator.
Neoprene Strap Neoprene strap with adhesive on one side used on all the contour of the mask and prevent any damage in the skin.
Exhaust Port Film Flexible film that provides the one way valve function of the exhaust port.
Voltage Regulator Electronic regulator for the adjustment of the air flow and current consumption.
Flexible Straps Flexible straps for the mask respirator which help to hold the respirator on the head of the user.
12 Volts Battery Battery of 12 V and 11,000 mAh.
Air Blower BCB1012UH Air blower with variable voltage input.
12 V Wire 12 V wire for quick connection between battery and voltage regulator.
Bi-Level CPAP System RT219 Hose used to connect the active gear and the mask respirators.
